name: Cobalt
tagline: Cobalt Hybrid Framework - the best of both world
body:
### Welcome to Cobalt Hybrid Framework.

Cobalt is a web and native framework to create mobile applications that can mix web technologies and native technologies.

It provides :
* a solid communication tool between web and native
* some pre-packaged features such as native push/pop transitions between HTML pages, native pull-to-refresh with javascript hooks
* plugins, to bring your own joy to this happy mix

### HTML5 versus Native apps : why choosing? use both !

The goal of the project is to ease the development of hybrid mobile apps, and avoid choosing between native and web : you can just use both and take advantage of the best of each.

### Cobalt is not PhoneGap / Cordova

The goal of Cordova is to bring native API access to javascript, and make the whole app layout with HTML5.

We think that HTML5 is not ready yet : It is hard to create ultra smooth transitions between pages (old devices), touch events are slow as hell, scrolling can be hard if you have a static header/footer, etc

Cobalt use native components where HTML5 fails.

read more aboute Cobalt versus Cordova **here**

### features and platforms

Cobalt is ready for iOs, Android, BlackBerry 10, Tizen, and soon Windows Phone

Current Features are :

* native push/pop called from javascript
* customisable native pull-to-refresh
* infiniteScroll detection
* native alerts from javascript (choose title, text, buttons and be warned on the result)
* web layers : create sexy popups with a second html layer
* native fullscreen videoPlayer
* toasts
* OS buttons (back, menu, ...)

We also fixed localStorage on Android and Ajax on BlackBerry10 (read more).

All the details are in the github wiki

Also be sure to watch on the plugin directory
